articles.description: The Prince of Wales says he's been "doing the Facetime" during coronavirus, but is 'terribly sad' not to see family and friends
articles.content: Told by interviewer Rhiannon Mills that the time to embrace loved ones will hopefully be coming soon, the Prince said: Well I do hope so because, don't worry, I do totally understand so many people's… [+1148 chars]
